title: Rebuild and deploy with layout fixes

requirements.text: Review and verify the PitchDisplay component implementation to ensure fixed-height placeholders ('—' for note, '0 Hz' for frequency) are correctly applied when no pitch is detected, preventing any layout shifts
acceptanceCriteria: The note field displays '—' when no note is detected
The frequency field displays '0 Hz' when no frequency is detected
No vertical layout shift occurs when pitch values change from detected to undetected states
The component maintains consistent spacing after key lock-in

requirements.text: Resolve any syntax errors, type mismatches, or missing imports that may have caused the previous deployment failure
acceptanceCriteria: No runtime errors occur during component rendering

requirements.text: Successfully build and deploy the application to the Internet Computer
acceptanceCriteria: Application is accessible via the deployed URL

constraints: Maintain all existing functionality in the AudioAnalyzer, CircleOfFifths, and KeySelector components
Preserve the current OKLCH color system and dark mode theming
Keep the single-actor Motoko backend architecture unchanged
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond fixing the deployment
Changing the UI design or layout beyond the fixed-height placeholder fix
Modifying backend logic or data structures
